Researchers	O	PERSON
report	O	O
progress	O	O
in	O	O
muscular	O	O
dystrophy	O	O
.	O	O
PHILADELPHIA	O	O
1996-08-29	O	O
University	O	O
of	O	O
Pennsylvania	O	O
researchers	O	O
on	O	O
Thursday	O	O
said	O	O
a	O	O
new	O	O
gene-therapy	O	O
technique	O	O
for	O	O
treating	O	O
muscular	O	O
dystrophy	O	O
disease	O	O
had	O	O
shown	O	O
progress	O	O
in	O	O
laboratory	O	O
animals	O	O
.	O	O
Word	O	O
of	O	O
the	O	O
findings	O	O
,	O	O
to	O	O
be	O	O
published	O	O
in	O	O
the	O	O
Oct.	O	O
1	O	O
issue	O	O
of	O	O
the	O	O
journal	O	O
"	O	O
Human	O	O
Gene	O	PERSON
Therapy	O	PERSON
,	O	O
"	O	O
came	O	O
in	O	O
advance	O	O
of	O	O
the	O	O
annual	O	O
Jerry	O	PERSON
Lewis	O	PERSON
Labour	O	O
Day	O	O
weekend	O	O
telethon	O	O
to	O	O
raise	O	O
money	O	O
for	O	O
muscular	O	O
dystrophy	O	O
research	O	O
.	O	O
Several	O	O
hurdles	O	O
must	O	O
be	O	O
overcome	O	O
before	O	O
the	O	O
method	O	O
is	O	O
used	O	O
in	O	O
human	O	O
trials	O	O
.	O	O
Nevertheless	O	O
,	O	O
"	O	O
a	O	O
treatment	O	O
based	O	O
on	O	O
the	O	O
new	O	O
strategy	O	O
....	O	O
may	O	O
have	O	O
the	O	O
potential	O	O
to	O	O
benefit	O	O
many	O	O
patients	O	O
,	O	O
"	O	O
the	O	O
University	O	O
of	O	O
Pennsylvania	O	O
Medical	O	O
Centre	O	O
said	O	O
in	O	O
a	O	O
release	O	O
.	O	O
Muscular	O	O
dystrophy	O	O
is	O	O
a	O	O
fatal	O	O
illness	O	O
in	O	O
which	O	O
the	O	O
body	O	O
's	O	O
muscle	O	O
tissue	O	O
degenerates	O	O
and	O	O
is	O	O
replaced	O	O
by	O	O
fat	O	O
.	O	O
Death	O	O
strikes	O	O
in	O	O
early	O	O
adulthood	O	O
.	O	O
Individuals	O	O
with	O	O
the	O	O
disease	O	O
have	O	O
a	O	O
non-working	O	O
version	O	O
of	O	O
a	O	O
gene	O	O
responsible	O	O
for	O	O
producing	O	O
a	O	O
crucial	O	O
muscle	O	O
protein	O	O
called	O	O
dystrophin	O	O
.	O	O
In	O	O
the	O	O
study	O	O
at	O	O
the	O	O
University	O	O
's	O	O
Institute	O	O
for	O	O
Human	O	O
Gene	O	PERSON
Therapy	O	PERSON
,	O	O
researchers	O	O
altered	O	O
a	O	O
common-cold	O	O
virus	O	O
to	O	O
carry	O	O
a	O	O
version	O	O
of	O	O
the	O	O
working	O	O
dystrophin	O	O
gene	O	O
.	O	O
The	O	O
virus	O	O
,	O	O
which	O	O
also	O	O
was	O	O
altered	O	O
to	O	O
minimise	O	O
its	O	O
susceptibility	O	O
to	O	O
the	O	O
immune	O	O
system	O	O
,	O	O
was	O	O
then	O	O
injected	O	O
into	O	O
the	O	O
muscle	O	O
cells	O	O
of	O	O
mice	O	O
bred	O	O
to	O	O
lack	O	O
dystrophin	O	O
genes	O	O
.	O	O

the	O	O
experiment	O	O
,	O	O
between	O	O
30	O	O
to	O	O
40	O	O
percent	O	O
of	O	O
the	O	O
muscle	O	O
fibers	O	O
in	O	O
one	O	O
group	O	O
of	O	O
mice	O	O
produced	O	O
dystrophin	O	O
for	O	O
two	O	O
weeks	O	O
before	O	O
diminishing	O	O
.	O	O

results	O	O
had	O	O
been	O	O
obtained	O	O
previously	O	O
in	O	O
test-tube	O	O
cell	O	O
cultures	O	O
,	O	O
but	O	O
not	O	O
in	O	O
live	O	O
animals	O	O
,	O	O
the	O	O
university	O	O
said	O	O
.	O	O

university	O	O
said	O	O
methods	O	O
are	O	O
still	O	O
needed	O	O
to	O	O
make	O	O
enough	O	O
of	O	O
the	O	O
altered	O	O
virus	O	O
to	O	O
treat	O	O
humans	O	O
,	O	O
to	O	O
further	O	O

virus	O	O
